In Olivia Colman: Films: The Lobster, The Favourite, and The Lost Daughter

…her work in Florian Zeller’s The Father (2020), in which she starred alongside Anthony Hopkins as a daughter coping with her father’s declining mental capacity. Colman also received an Academy Award nomination for her portrayal of a divorced professor in Maggie Gyllenhaal’s The Lost Daughter (2021), an adaptation of Elena…

In Anthony Hopkins: Later movie and television roles
